title: Sisters, nine and six, burst into tears of joy when their parents tell them about Disney Cruise
text:
A pair of screaming young daughters bawling their eyes out in the back seat of a car would usually be most parents' nightmare.

But nine-year-old Cecilia and six year-old Harper were crying tears of joy after they were en route to the Disney cruise of their dreams.

Parents Abby and Kenn Snipes, 38 and 39, sprung the surprise on their journey to Port Canaveral, Florida, where the girls thought they were going to the beach.

The couple filmed the big reveal.

In the footage, their two daughters are sat in the back seat as the family's luggage is piled up in the boot behind them.

Cecilia waves at the camera as Kenn can be heard in the background saying: 'Me and mommy are matching but you aren't matching.'

Their mother then passes something to them and says: 'Yeah, you guys might need what is in these bags.'

Cecilia and Harper were filmed by their parents on their journey to Port Canaveral, Florida, where the girls thought they were going to the beach. They were handed their daughters Disney-emblazoned t-shirts which left them baffled

The pair seem delighted with their new clothes but are still confused as to why they have been presented with Disney-emblazoned clothes until they eventually twig

The girls excitedly ask 'what is it?' as they fumble around in the cloth bags.

Kenn asks 'you didn't notice what we were wearing?' as they each pull out a blue t-shirt.

Cecilia and Harper seem delighted with their new clothes but are still confused as to why they have been presented with Disney-emblazoned clothes.

Eventually, they twig as they being to squeal with glee.

Cecilia then bursts into tears as her younger sister repeatedly asks: 'When?'

Their parents reveal they are going right now which is met with even more tears and screams of joy.

The video ends shortly after.

Cecilia then bursts into tears as her younger sister repeatedly asks: 'When?'

Their parents said they were taken aback from the adorable reaction from the excited pair.

Abby added: 'The girls had not noticed the whole morning that their Dad and I were wearing the same shirts.

'I thought that using the 'Take me on a Cruise' shirts would be a great way to break the news to them without giving it away immediately that it was going to be a Disney cruise.

'I had been planning the cruise for about six months without the girls knowing a single thing.

Their parents reveal they are going right now which is met with even more tears and screams of joy, which is where the video ends

'Keeping it a secret from them was one of the hardest things I have had to do and I almost ruined the surprise a couple times.

'The girls had been begging to go on a Disney cruise for years, but as with everyone, money was tight, so when we were able to do the cruise we wanted to make it extra special by not telling them about it until we pulled into the port that morning!'

'When Cecilia reacted so emotionally it really took me aback and I couldn't help but cry right along with her.

'This vacation was so needed for the four of us and a long time coming, lots of saving up.'
description: Abby and Kenn Snipes sprung the surprise en route to Port Canaveral, Florida. They handed their daughters Disney-emblazoned t-shirts which originally left them baffled.
